# Catalog API

#### How to Run?

```
    $ npm install
```
#### and
````
    $ cp .env.example .env
    $ docker-compose up -d
````
## Endpoints

.env
DB_USER=docker
DB_PASS=docker
DB_HOST=db
DB_NAME=catalog
SERVER_PORT=3502
REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379
CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost
